original: cofix CI. intros l Hneq. case label_silent_dec. - intro Heq; rewrite Heq in *; clear Heq. intros s0 H_exec H_af H_cont. move: (H_cont (l, s0)) => H2. case: H2 => H2; first by case: H2. case: H2 => t' H2. inversion H_exec; subst. * case: H2 => H2. inversion H2. - intros Hneq_sil. intros s0 H_exec H_af. case: H_exec => s1[e][H_pt_map] H_exec. move: (lb_step_pt_map_label_enabled_preserved H_pt_map Hneq_sil) => H_eq. rewrite H_eq in H_af. move: (weak_fair_now_preserved H_af) => H_af'. eapply CI; eauto. * clear CI. move: H_af => [[t][Hnow] H_af]. move: (weak_fair_now Hnow H_af) => Hnow'. exists t; split; auto. by apply continuously_preserved with (f := pt_map_infseq_event); [apply pt_map_infseq_event_continuous|].
